text: Randall Desmond Archibald (February 21, 1960 – August 14, 2018), better known by stage name Randy Rampage, was a Canadian metal and punk singer and bass musician. He was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. Rampage was a founding member, bass player and vocalist of the Canadian hardcore band D.O.A., and the lead singer of the thrash metal band Annihilator in 1988–1989 and again from 1998 to 2000. Rampage died on August 14, 2018 at his home in North Vancouver from a heart attack, aged 58. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Canadian singers Category:Musicians from Vancouver
title: Randy Rampage
